property.name: sessionUserIdAttribute
property.description: Session attribute to capture as the user ID of the trace. Traces can be filtered by user ID in the trace explorer. Nested paths are supported, e.g. something.user.username. The attribute value is converted into a String if necessary via toString().

property.name: sessionAttributes
property.description: Comma-separated list of http session attributes to capture in the servlet span's context map. These captured attributes are viewable under the servlet span for any trace in the trace explorer. Nested paths are supported, e.g. mainObject.nestedObject.displayName. A special single value of '*' means capture all session attributes. Attribute values are converted into Strings if necessary via toString().

property.name: captureStartup
property.description: Capture servlet startup time associated with javax.servlet.ServletContextListener.contextInitialized(), javax.servlet.Servlet.init() and javax.servlet.Filter.init().
